name: Package name, also the name in the DESCRIPTION file, note that this may be different from the GitHub repo name
type: Category - only packages included for now, may include others later

status.description: Current state of the package, different from installable

levels.good: Everything is good, everything should work fine
levels.hiatus: Taking a break for a reason, e.g., waiting for next version of an API
levels.deprecated: Not maintaining any longer, though may still be installable

category: Category - what the package does/data it deals with
on_cran: Logical - is the package on CRAN
cran_archived: Logical - if the package is on CRAN, is it archived?
url: Code repository URL, usually a GitHub repository
root: Path to root of the R package (if an R package exists). If in root of repo, then zero length string
fork: Logical - is the repo a fork
